column1: Nielthi was an Elf-maid of Melian who was mentioned in an earlier stage of J.R.R. Tolkiens legendarium
column2: in the tale of The Nauglafring. She was fleeing from Thingols realm due to an attack by the Orcs and the Dwarves. At the same time
column3: she tried to encourage Gwendelin by praising her magic that protected the realm.

column1: Category:Characters in The Book of Lost Tales
